markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Moderate Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4030) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 62</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Lesser Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4022)

</column>

---

You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with [Envenom](/Actions.aspx?ID=1451) to moderate vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per 10 minutes.

 **Moderate Vishkanyan Venom** (level 9) **Frequency** once per 10 minutes; **Saving Throw** Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 5d6 poison damage (1 round)

<title level="2">Moderate Enhance Venom leads to...</title>
[Greater Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4036), [Stronger Debilitating Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4033)
name: Moderate Enhance Venom
